segments.text: Excuse me , i am a new student here . Could you tell me where the English Department is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is in that brand new , tall building over there . On the 9th floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is the basement of that red building in front of the tower with big bells .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Computer Center is on the first floor of the library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The library is next to the Adminstration Building . The Adminstration Building is over there near the school ’ s main entrance . There are school maps for free in the lobby of the Admin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I will go get one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Glad to be of service . By the way , my name is Mike Sullivan . You will see me around a lot . I am running for President of the Student Government .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , hi ! My name is Eve Markowski . I am glad to meet you . With your friendly smile and helpful attitude . I am sure you will win .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . I ’ d better go . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
